definition: to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)

sentences.english: Joachaz was three and twenty years old when he began to reign, and he reigned three months in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 约阿哈次登极时二十三岁，在耶路撒冷为王三个月。

sentences.english: Biden is all too likely to make a similar mess.
sentences.chinese: 拜登极有可能也来这么一下子。

definition: to confer a title on (an empress or a prince)
to change an emperor's or ruler's reign title (old)
to succeed to a title/to inherit
to hand down an imperial edict
Taishang Huang/Retired Emperor/father of the reigning emperor/fig. puppet master
to hold a court audience/to govern from the imperial throne (applies esp. to Empress Dowager or Regent)
Great Ancestor (posthumous title, e.g. for the founder of a dynasty)
